Title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Writer: David Koepp (screenplay), George Lucas (story), Jeff Nathanson (story), George Lucas (characters), Philip Kaufman (characters)
Actors: Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Karen Allen, Shia LaBeouf
Plot: In 1957, archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. (Harrison Ford) is called back into action and becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 10 wins & 35 nominations.
